comment: Professor Veira knows her stuff and is willing to help. Accessible outside of class, but can take a while to respond to emails. Attendance was not for a grade but there was still a sign-in sheet. Do the writing assignments and papers, they count for most of your grade. My only complaint is that she wasn't the most organized. Overall, good professor
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy
